/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The viewer's perspective is that of a pedestrian standing on the sidewalk, looking down the length of the street. The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves forming a canopy overhead. On the right side of the street, there's a brick wall adorned with graffiti, adding a touch of urban art to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The image is taken from a low angle, which gives a unique perspective, making the viewer feel as if they are part of the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The image is a beautiful representation of the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
